content.json:
# DomainTools Threat Intelligence Dashboard
Visualize and correlate DomainTools threat domain data with Microsoft Sentinel telemetry.
---

This workbook provides insights into domains flagged by DomainTools, their ingestion frequency, domain types.

content.query:
DomainToolsThreatIntelDomains_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), domaintype
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| render barchart
content.title: Domains in Last 12 Hours

content.query:
DomainToolsThreatIntelDomains_CL
| summarize Count = count() by domaintype
| render piechart
content.title: Domain Count by Type

content.query:
DomainToolsThreatIntelDomains_CL
| summarize TotalDomains = count(), LatestIngestion = max(TimeGenerated)
content.title: Overview: Ingested Domains Summary
